title: CSS Variables (Custom Properties)
description: Create a CSS variable named --main-color and apply it to a button's background.
hints: Declare CSS variables in :root for global scope.

title: Keyframe Animation
description: Create an animation that moves a box from left to right over 3 seconds.

title: Complex Selector Challenge
description: Style all paragraph elements only when they are inside a div with class .content and adjacent to an h2.
hints: Use adjacent sibling selector + combined with ancestor class.

title: Grid Template Areas
description: Create a 3-area grid layout: header, content, footer using grid-template-areas.

title: 3D Transform
description: Apply a 3D rotation to a card that rotates 20 degrees on the Y-axis when hovered.

title: Responsive Grid (Auto-fit)
description: Use auto-fit to create a grid that adjusts item count based on screen size with minmax(200px, 1fr).
hints: auto-fit or auto-fill helps responsive columns.

title: Advanced Pseudo-class: nth-child
description: Color every even row of a table using nth-child(even).

title: Overlay Effect
description: Create an overlay effect where a dark semi-transparent layer appears over an image on hover.
hints: Use absolute positioning with z-index and opacity.

title: CSS Clip-path Shape
description: Use clip-path to create a circular cropped image.

title: Sticky Element
description: Make a sidebar stick to the top when scrolling using position: sticky.
hints: Sticky acts like relative until threshold is passed.
